name: subcli

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

comment: Closure law for subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)
